ED_Title: General debate of the seventy-eighth session of the General Assembly
ED_DecisionText: At its 2nd plenary meeting, on 8 September 2023, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the General Committee as set forth in its first report (footnote: A/78/250, para 37),  and taking note that, pursuant to resolution 57/301 of 13 March 2003, the general debate would begin at 9 a.m. on Tuesday, 19 September 2023, and will continue on Wednesday, Thursday and Friday, 20–22 September, and on Tuesday, 26 September, decided that the general debate would continue on Saturday, 23 September 2023, in order to maximize the number of speakers during that week.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/78/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
